about_the_game:
About This Game

Embark on an epic journey in sea war, a thrilling naval combat game where strategy, skill, and bravery determine your fate on the high seas. Command your own ship, upgrade it, and become the most feared pirate captain of all time.

Key Features:

Ship Customization: Upgrade your ship with powerful cannons, elite cannonballs, and a highly skilled crew. Equip special materials and unique items to give you an edge over your enemies.

Naval Battles: Engage in intense naval battles against other players in real-time. Use your strategic prowess to outmaneuver your foes and send them to the depths.

Fleet System: Build or join a fleet to conquer islands and dominate the seas. Coordinate with your fleet members to execute massive attacks and defend your territory.

Daily Quests & Events: Complete daily quests to earn experience points and speed up your progression. Participate in regular events to showcase your skills and earn exclusive rewards.

Leaderboard: Prove your dominance by climbing the ranks. The strongest and most skilled players will see their ship names featured prominently on the game’s leaderboard.

Open World Exploration: Explore a vast open world filled with hidden treasures, dangerous foes, and mysterious islands. Each journey offers new challenges and opportunities.

Multiplayer: Join forces with friends or challenge other players in exciting multiplayer modes. Strengthen your alliances and show the world your might.

Stunning Graphics & Sound: Experience the beauty and danger of the seas with stunning graphics and immersive sound effects that bring the world of Sea War to life.

Set sail, captain, and carve your legend in the treacherous waters of Sea War. Whether you seek glory, treasure, or simply the thrill of battle, the seas await your command.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q8200 @ 2.33GHz 2.33 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 660 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection Requirement

short_description: Can you rule this mighty sea?
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
